name: Marla
wishText: I wanted to make a list of all the things I love about you for this special day, but I realized it may take too long and most likley be gramatically incorrect ( •̯́ ₃ •̯̀)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday Marlita 🍰♡ ༘*.ﾟ🧸🎀 I hope you are having a very special 22nd birthday and hope that we can get together soon to get drunk at a jazz club!🍸🎷
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are really Special to me
outroText: See you soon girly! I hope you have a day full of peace and blessings ˙ᵕ˙
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
